author: Fextralife
description:
Bloodlines 2 Beginner Guide - 10 Must-Know Gameplay Tips & Tricks
In this Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 video. I'm going to be giving you guys some helpful tips to help get off to a good start. I have learned quite a few things while playing the game over the last couple of weeks, so I hope these tips can be helpful to you. Most of these are combat-related, but we will be getting into classes as well, and give you some recommendations on skills and what bloodlines I think you might want to select.

Get the game here: https://play.bloodlines2.com/Fextralife
Sponsored by: Paradox Interactive and White Wolf

Timestamp
0:00 Bloodlines 2 Beginner Guide

3:03 Passives and Perks
8:25 Are you Hidden?
8:54 Silent But Deadly
9:34 Don't break the Masquerade
10:19 Grab and Execute
11:12 Aggro Management 101
11:56 Vampires hate lead too
12:17 Learn to Parry

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel f
title: Bloodlines 2 Beginner Guide - 10 Must Know Gameplay Tips & Tricks
